text: Alex Sampao (born 31 December 1996) is a Kenyan sprinter. He won gold at the 2015 African Games as part of the 4x400 metre relay team. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 2016 Summer Olympics. He competed in the man's 800 metres at the 2017 Gavardo Memorial Max Corso (ITA) Results table for 800man Gavardo race ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Kenya Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:African Games gold medalists for Kenya Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2015 African Games
title: Alex Sampao
